about.text: I am a freelance developer with experience designing and developing custom websites for charitable and for-profit organizations. I develop websites based on the needs and the desires of the each client.  I develop websites in a variety of frameworks and platforms including React, Bootstrap and Wordpress.  I also develop websites hosted on AWS using S3 buckets, AWS Amplify and Cloudfront. I work with clients and their vendors and other volunteer providors to create vibrant, dependable, easy to use websites.
